channel.title: I'm trying to get Skillcapes to require level 99, and need to add specials
channel.description: As well as emotes for the skill capes, there have probably been previous posts like this but I didn't see any, so if anyone can help, it would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: I'm trying to get Skillcapes to require level 99, and need to add specials
item.dc:creator: @kniveslives kniveslives
item.description:
@kniveslives wrote:

[quote=“squal707, post:19, topic:151631”][quote author=joecool390 link=topic=207395.msg1822081#msg1822081 date=1192360391]

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == ID && playerLevel[SKILLID] = DESIRED LVL) { // Admin cape playerEquipment[playerCape] = ID; } else { playerEquipment[playerCape] = -1; sendMessage("DUMBASS YOU NEED MAX (SKILL NAME) TO WEAR THIS CAPE!"); }
[/quote]

this pretty much explains it …[/quote]

I don’t have that, someone told me to go to GetCLPrayer, which I did and set the Return to 99, but it still doesn’t add the requirement.

Read full topic
